name: Malaysia specialty coffee hopping
description: Malaysia specialty coffee market has been growing few years back, besides the chain store like Starbucks and Coffee Bean or local Kopi ( you might want to experience it...) , Malaysian are craving for more! From farmer to beans to your daily dose of coffee, locals started to be aware of the importance of every single step. So, this triip is all about coffee. So let's walk around the city and enjoy how Malaysian prepare their specialty coffee, and have fun!
